products.title: Ember Mug 2, 14 oz, Black
products.description: Designed for home or office, the Ember Mug 2 does more than simply keep your coffee hot. Our smart mug allows you to set an exact drinking temperature, so your coffee is never too hot, or too cold.

products.title: Ember Mug 2, 14 oz, Red
products.description: Designed for home or office, the Ember Mug 2 does more than simply keep your coffee hot. Our smart mug allows you to set an exact drinking temperature, so your coffee is never too hot, or too cold.

products.title: Ember Tumbler, 16 oz, Black
products.description: Designed to be used wherever life takes you, the Ember Tumbler does more than simply keep your coffee hot. Our largest mug yet, the 16 oz Tumbler allows you to set an exact drinking temperature and keeps it there for up to 3 hours, so your coffee is never too hot, or too cold. It features our most advanced chip ever for improved Bluetooth.

products.title: Extra Charging Coaster 2: Ember Mug 2, Black
products.description: The Charging Coaster 2 boasts a new streamlined design that covers less surface area, so you can enjoy more counter space.

products.title: Sliding Lid, 14 oz
products.description: Your perfect warmth â€” extended. Keep your Ember Mug splash-free, while extending the battery life to keep your drink warmer for longer. Compatible with Ember Mug and available in 10 oz and 14 oz sizes.

products.title: Ember Car Charger, Black
products.description: Now you can maintain your Ember Travel Mug's perfect temperature even longer with the Ember Car Charger. Ensure your Ember Travel Mug stays fully charged for your longest road trip or commute, so it is always ready when you are.

products.title: Bottle Brush, Black
products.description: Safely clean all of your Ember products with the Bottle Brush.

products.title: Sipping Lid, Black
products.description: Always open and ready for the next sip of your favorite hot beverage.
